programme.title: Kristen Stewart vs. Robert Pattinson
programme.desc: S1:E2 Every girl wanted to be Bella Swan in the blockbuster movie, Twilight. When Kristen Stewart auditioned and got the role, she fell in love with co-star Robert Pattinson shortly after, and the world became obsessed with the new young couple. But what Kristen didn’t expect was the endless media scrutiny, paparazzi following her entire life, and the endless craze from fans. After getting caught in a shocking scandal and being villainized by the entire world. But the media got her story wrongKristen had to embrace her authenticity to have the courage to be who she truly was regardless of what the world thought. We dug into Kristen and Roberts romance to find the real life story behind the tabloids.

programme.title: Drake Bell vs. Josh Peck
programme.desc: S1:E15 Everyone loved Drake & Josh but people don’t know the dark story behind the world’s favorite kids’ show. Josh struggled with his weight and addiction while filming the show. It was always painful for him to be the chubby sidekick to the cool, popular Drake. Then Josh shocked the world when he revealed that he and Drake weren’t even really friends. Drake was furious, sparking a massive backlash against Josh. But no one knew just how dark of a path Drake had gone down.

programme.title: Winona Ryder vs. Johnny Depp
programme.desc: S1: E10 Johnny Depp’s trial with Amber Heard had everyone talking, but wait until you hear about Winona Ryder’s. Johnny experienced love at first sight and became obsessed with Winona. But after their breakup, Winona dealt with mental health issues and her own very public trial, which has some striking similarities with Johnny and Ambers. Everyone thought she was a crazy, and the aftermath of her court case left her banished from the world. Winona went through a great awakening outside of the public eye and bounced back into Hollywood.

programme.title: Gwen Stefani vs. Gavin Rossdale
programme.desc: S1:E3 When Gwen Stefani’s happy 20-year relationship with Gavin Rossdale came crashing down, and she started dating Blake Shelton right after the divorce, the media went crazy. Discover the real story of the months of media torture Gwen had to go through, and where she is now in her new relationship with her new man.

programme.title: The Rise of Frank Shamrock
programme.desc: S1:E2 Frank Shamrock was one of the toughest fighters to ever compete in the UFC. He holds the world record for the fastest consecutive knockouts, but his biggest fight happened when he was a child, living with his stepfather. His stepfather emotionally abused him so devastatingly, that even when Frank was sent to a Juvenile Detention Center, the other kids couldn’t believe what he went through. While many kids would be crushed under such pain and suffering, Frank Shamrock was determined to prove why warriors always find a way to win.

programme.title: The Rise of Jonny Kim
programme.desc: S1:E3 From the outside, Jonny Kim looks like one of the most ambitious people you’ll ever hear about. A person who can become a Navy SEAL, a doctor and an astronaut all before the age of 40 must be a confident, talented person. However, Jonny didn’t grow up aspiring to be a highly trained soldier-doctor capable of going to outer space. It was only until he experienced one of the darkest, most traumatic things a child could go through, that he discovered a calling way bigger than himself.

programme.title: The Rise of Wim Hof
programme.desc: S1:E1 The Iceman (Wim Hof), a man seemingly immune to freezing temperatures, who once climbed Mount Everest only in his shorts and shoes sounds like a fictional superhero. But Wim isn’t invincible to pain, in fact, the opposite. The worst tragedy he’s suffered was the catalyst that inspired him to master his mind and body and help millions do the same.

programme.title: The Rise of Rocky NoHands
programme.desc: S1:E4 How would you feel if you lost in Fortnite to one of the worlds best players, and found out he was using his mouth as a controller? RockyNoHands is a professional eSports Fortnite player, making a career of playing a video game he loves and being among the best in the world at it. After the darkest moment of Rocky’s life left him paralyzed and motionless in a hospital bed, doctors told him he may never walk again. It wasn’t until a source of pure motivation forced him to dig deep to find his unbreakable drive, that he was able to take on his biggest and most rewarding challenge yet.

programme.title: Misdiagnosed - Every Mother's Worst Nightmare
programme.desc: Victoria felt a pain in her abdomen. Doctor’s said she was faking it and then the unthinkable happened. She began to deteriorate and ended up completely paralyzed. She was a prisoner in her own body, trapped inside capable of hearing everything but incapable of responding. Doctors gave up but her mother never lost hope. That hope kept her alive and her story has captured the nation’s attention.

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: GSP: Behind The Mask
programme.desc: As a child, Georges St-Pierre was bullied relentlessly by an older and much bigger boy at his school. He was tortured, and humiliated on a daily basis, leading to years of built up anger and frustration. It was this traumatizing childhood experience that led him to study martial arts and become one of the most celebrated UFC Champions in the world. Years later, Georges faced his childhood bully once again. What he chose to do in that moment is nothing short of amazing.

programme.title: Ultimate Freedom March: Remembering John Lewis
programme.desc: This short documentary is a tribute to the memory of civil rights leader John Lewis, his relationship with Martin Luther King Jr. and the courage he showed in fighting for an ideal, for freedom, democracy and justice. There is a moment in everyones life when our hearts are pounding and we are inspired and motivated to be the hero of our story. Step forward and go for what you believe in.

programme.title: Lessons from a Kidnapping
programme.desc: Elizabeth Smart was kidnapped at 14 years old and was missing for 9 grueling months. Those were the worst months of her life, the details of which were so awful, she refused to share her story for ten years… until something changed. This is her story of survival and strength.

programme.title: Jonny Kim: Launched into Adulthood
programme.desc: Jonny Kim changed careers three times before he even turned 40! Who would believe that this highly decorated Navy SEAL, doctor, and NASA astronaut would be hiding a tragic secret about his past? In the end, what his colleagues have to say about him will bring you to tears.

programme.title: Surviving A Serial Killer
programme.desc: S1:E2 Lisa McVey did not want to live past 17 years old, and on the day she wrote her goodbye letter, was snatched in the street. For the next 26 hours, it was up to Lisa to outsmart her captor, later identified as serial killer Bobby Joe Long.

programme.title: Daryl Davis Did the Unthinkable
programme.desc: Daryl Davis was determined to understand why he was hated for the color of his skin. His pursuit for answers brought him face to face with the leader of the KKK. Find out how one conversation is changing history in real time.

programme.title: The Dark Past Of Funny Man Tyler Perry
programme.desc: Tyler Perry stepped into the limelight with his character, Madea. He played a hilarious, tough-love woman who shared countless lessons on self-esteem, respecting yourself, and staying strong. Behind the scenes though, Tyler lived a life of bitterness and rage. There was one person he couldn’t forgive and it nearly cost him everything.

programme.title: Dave Chappelle Tells All
programme.desc: You may love or hate Dave Chappelle, but he did the right thing here. One minute he was the hottest comedian in the country and completely vanished the next. Discover how racism pushed him out of show business and why it’s fuelling his return.

programme.title: Embrace the Suck
programme.desc: Navy SEAL veteran David Goggins shares how he overcame so many debilitating obstacles to later achieve incredible military and personal honors, and the mentality that kept him going and made him push beyond his limits.

programme.title: 10x Your Life
programme.desc: Author, entrepreneur, and sales savant, Grant Cardone, breaks down the power of his 10X Rule and how you can use it to multiply your success.

programme.title: Five Major Changes to Social Security for 2025: What You Need to Know
programme.desc: "Today, I want to shed light on the major Social Security changes for 2025. These updates will significantly impact benefits, taxes, and retirement planning for millions of Americans."

programme.title: Hearing & Fitness
programme.desc: "Jeanniey Walden discusses the importance of hearing aids and is inspired by author Amy Morelands journey in the fitness industry. Special Guest, William Shatner."

programme.title: Curiosity
programme.desc: "A good mindset is everything! Jeanniey Walden helps you shift yours with Jamie Hess, founder of the Gratitudeology and delves into trauma bonds with Dr Nadine Macaluso of the real Wolf of Wall Street fame."

programme.title: The Social Security Trap: When Waiting Until 70 Becomes a Huge Mistake
programme.desc: Are you considering delaying your Social Security benefits until age 70 based on the belief that the break-even age is around 80 or 81? This might not be the best decision for you. In this video, James delves into a real client example to illustrate how decisions around Social Security can have profound implications on your financial plan.

programme.title: The Hidden Danger of Relying on Traditional Retirement Planning
programme.desc: Have you ever felt fully prepared for something, only to realize that you approached it the wrong way? Its a feeling no one ever wants to experience, especially when it comes to retirement planning. In this video, well explore a real client example, where a couple named Tim and Jennifer were initially on track for traditional retirement planning. However, they came to realize that theres more to retirement than just maximizing your portfolios value. Lets dive into this eye-opening client case and discover what we should do differently.

programme.title: The Polarization of Medicare Plans
programme.desc: "Opinions on Medicare Advantage and Supplemental plans vary widely, shaped by personal experiences, conflicting information, and external influences."

programme.title: "The Worst Supplemental Plan vs The BEST Paying A $282,000 Medical Bill"
programme.desc: "Many of you on Medicare have chosen a Supplemental Plan that has many benefits and can save you thousands in Medical bills. However, not all Supplemental plans are the same. In this episode, Medicare Schools Chief Educator Marvin Musick, will show you the best and worst Supplemental Plan for a $282K bill for lung cancer."

programme.title: Navigating Change
programme.desc: "Jeanniey Walden is joined by sesame Street for laughter and love talks, Lara Eurdolian for bulding your business and youve got to hear how Lynwood Bibbens, CEO of ReachTV stays ahead of the competition."

programme.title: See How Much This Roth Conversion Strategy Saved Them
programme.desc: Understanding the tangible impact and the critical factors of Roth conversions is essential. James walks us through a client case study to demonstrate how Roth conversions can significantly impact your retirement savings. But is Roth conversion right for you? James considers five critical factors, looking at the case study of David (58) and Lisa (57), who have a substantial net worth, primarily in pre-tax accounts.

programme.title: Saschiz Old Town, Romania
programme.desc: Saschiz, village, and commune, Mureș județ county is located in central Romania. The villages of Saschiz, Mihai Viteazu, and Cloașterf make up the larger commune of Saschiz. Located in the old region of Transylvania, it lies about 20 km east of Sighișoara"&". First documented in the 14th century, Saschiz is known for its medieval fortress and church constructed by Transylvanian Saxons, a German speaker. They settled in Transylvania when it was part of Hungary. The ruins of the 14th-century fortress sit atop "&"a hill overlooking the village. The late 15th-century fortified church has Gothic details and an imposing clock tower. Along with five other villages with fortified churches, Saschiz was inscribed on UNESCO’s World Heritage sites in 1999.

He joins the team to win the heart of Jada Thomas, which is the beginning of an interracial relationship, but multiple obstacles such as a rival player Donte Styles, his boss Mr. Deaton, Jada's father, Pops, and the societal pressures of middle class Cincinnati, Ohio, stand in his way.

programme.title: Tony Driver
programme.desc: One day, Pasquale decides to change his name and be called Tony. Because despite being born in Bari in the mid-60s, he crossed the ocean with his family at 9 years of age and grew up as a real American, all hot dogs and rockabilly. He has never been back to Italy until when, now a taxi driver in Yuma, he's arrested on account of his side hustle - smuggling illegal immigrants into the US across the Mexican border. He is therefore forced to make a choice: jail in Arizona or deportation to Italy. Once back in Puglia, he finds himself living alone in a cave at Polignano a Mare, looking at Italy as a small, inert country, with no opportunities and no dreams. But Tony is not willing to give up.

Siyinqaba
programme.desc: Nalle Hukkataival and Jimmy Webb recently traveled to Swaziland in search of new boulders and found an unforgettable country with amazing people and fascinating culture. But finding boulder problems isn’t as easy as it sounds, you might end up walking through fields and forest for hours and find nothing. Or you might find a gem, something that could possibly be THE next hard line, maybe even the African Star…

programme.title: Kwanza
programme.desc: Kwanza – The Drowning Diamond of Angola. When Olympic kayaker Mike Dawson heard rumors a river the size of the Zambezi hidden in West Africa he set in motion an ambitious plan to travel into the heart of Angola on the adventure of a life time to attempt the rivers wild rapids. ‘Kwanza’ is the story of that journey. An odyssey from the highlands of Zambia, through the deserts of Namibia and into the rawness of Angola.

programme.title: Kayaking the 'Canadian Amazon'
programme.desc: Big Creek in Southern Ontario's Norfolk County is commonly referred to as ‘the Canadian Amazon’ as it winds its way through thick forest, while presenting paddlers with a natural obstacle course of fallen trees. Join host, Ken Whiting, as he explores this ecological wonder from the seat of his kayak.

programme.title: Cooke City SD
programme.desc: Join Chris Collins, Ryan Oakden, and Skogan Sprang as they head to Cooke City, Montana. Using locals as their guides, the crew finds plenty of cliffs to drop and straight-line some chutes while building tow-in booters.

programme.title: You Never Know
programme.desc: This documentary movie tells the story of one of the most successful female paragliding pilots in history. Klaudia shows throughout her career that if you really want something there is no way to stop you to make it happen. Regardless many difficulties she manages to win the World Champion Title in 2013. But she didn’t stop there. Winning medals isn’t the goal but progress, pursuit of personal excellence, sharing joy with friends and motivating others to follow their dreams is.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: Weyakin SD
programme.desc: Join a talented and ragtag band of kayakers as they seek out the wildest whitewater in the world alongside a Teton Gravity Research film crew.

programme.title: Kayaking Québec City
programme.desc: Join host, Ken Whiting, as he sea kayaks along the Jacques Cartier River before heading to Québec City to explore the cobblestone streets and old buildings the UNESCO World Heritage Site is known for.

programme.title: FIA Karting European Championship
programme.desc: The road to karting glory begins in Campillos, Spain, as the continent’s top young talents go wheel-to-wheel in the opening round of the FIA Karting European Championship.

Whether you're a seasoned horticulturist or just starting out, you'll find fresh ideas and practical techniques to cultivate the garden of your dreams.

programme.title: Let's Play a Game
programme.desc: Whether indoors or out, games are fun! Bowl at home with family and friends with a colorful bowling set Katie makes from recycled water bottles. Franz shows how to create your own game board using a variety of art mediums. Jenny and Katie make an indoor hopscotch court that rolls-up, for easy storage. Braid a ring toss toy then use the Family Craft box to make a treasure hunt jar for quiet fun.

programme.title: Blending
programme.desc: One of the keys of impressionism is the blending together of images. The definition of this movement in art is characterized by visible brush strokes, ordinary subject matters, and an emphasis on light and its changing qualities. The first project is an impressionistic landscape using oil pastels and black mat board. Then we're using dye in spray bottles to make colorful geometric designs. Learn about color blending using special tools to create interesting effects in your art journal. And finally, blend colored glue to create a piece of art.

The foreman connives to sabotage the inventor's masterwork.

programme.desc: An inventor labors on a horn to directly communicate emotions in an all-powerful way, while he's building violins in a factory. programme.title: Episode 45
programme.desc: This classic children's comedy show about the mishaps and learning curves of Count Frightenstein and his wacky friends in exile at Frankenstone.

programme.title: FUNNY LITTTLE CARS 2 FUN AT OASIS CITY
programme.desc: In our sequel, the Citizens of Doom Valley are not human beings but cars, trucks, boats, scooters, and containers with solid human characteristics. Criminals and environmentally unsound businesses are destroying Doom Valley, and its up to the few residents left in town to stay and fight back.

programme.title: LOVE IS NOT ENOUGH
programme.desc: A filmmaker is given a commission to make a pop video but takes the money and attempts to complete his own long term film project. He takes to the road and tries to re-engage his old cast but finds them no longer interested in the film. Things go from bad to worse when the crew he has managed to recruit also decide to bail out. This is a film about perseverance in the face of adversity.

programme.title: FINDING CALLARO
programme.desc: The once beautiful and lush Planet Kepler is now dry and near death, after its precocious Callaro plant was exploited to extinction by Earthers because the Callaro plant was known throughout the galaxy as a source of super energy. In this outer space 3-D animated adventure reminiscent of JIMMY NEUTRON and AVATAR, three brave Kepler SpaceKids, Axel, Jono, and Gaga, want to rebuild their desolate planet by following the ancient legend of the lost Callaro oasis. Axel leads his friends into danger as they battle evil Earthers, giant spaceships, and destructive Robots as they journey down the depths of a volcano to retrieve the last Callaro seed and try to save the planet.

programme.title: The Urgent Moment
programme.desc: On the eve of the Long March, the Red Army suffered heavy losses under the command of the erroneous military line of Li De and Bogu and was in a completely passive position. The Red Army made a decision on a strategic shift. Meanwhile the Red Expansion Movement in the Soviet Region was being carried out enthusiastically, and Liu Zao, a famous medical successor who was determined to go to the battlefield, joined the Red Army team. The Independent Regiment with Xiao Qiang as the regiment commander and the Red Ninth Regiment with Chen Xiong as chief of staff were ordered to go to the front line to replace the Red Army team that had previously carried out the peripheral cover mission. They launched an arduous blockade battle against the Kuomintang reactionary troops who frantically attacked the Soviet region on different battlefields. At this time, the Military Commission issued an urgent order, ordering Xiao Qiang to lead his troops to the battlefield of Laoyingpan to rescue the seriously wounded commander of the Western army. After learning that the commander of the Western Army of the Red Army had been wounded in the battle on the front line of Laoyingpan, the Central Revolutionary Military Commission urgently ordered Xiao Qiangs independent regiment to rush to the front line to rescue. Under the blockade of the enemy, Commander Chen was successfully rescued in the battlefield of Laoyingpan, but was in a critical situation. Fortunately, Chen Xiong led the 9th Red Regiment to meet from the periphery, and after a hard battle, he broke through the enemys blockade and successfully transferred Commander Chen to the 8th Rear Hospital of the Red Army. After further treatment, he was sent to the Jiangxi Military District Hospital in Anfu, Ningdu.Upon completing the rescue and escort mission, Xiao Qiang received an order from the Central Revolutionary Military Commission: to form a pioneer reconnaissance company called Sword of Xingguo to carry out special combat tasks for the column of the Military Commission.

programme.title: ""I received three blank cheques from Swiggy...Geetham Murali" | Open Talk"

It premiered on 19 February 2018 on Sun TV, replacing Deivamagal, and was replaced by Anbe Vaa and it ended on 31 October 2020. The show was produced by Vikatan Televistas Pvt Ltd and directed by S Kumaran. Nayagi was also re-aired on Kalaignar TV from 1 March 2021 and it ended its run on 9 July 2022 Plot Anandhi, a middle-class woman, struggles to keep her life together while dealing with an alcoholic father and his debts. programme.title: Golden Eggs
programme.desc: Hoodie has his eyes on the hens eggs in GrandPAs farm. Keet has saved them once but is sure Hoodie will try again.

programme.title: Heungboo and Nolboo
programme.desc: Mischievous UGo takes all of his parents property and kicks his younger brother GoGo out of the house. Meanwhile, a swallow bird brings a gourd seed to the eaves of a kind-hearted GoGo house, and soon, gourds containing gold and silver treasures opens on the roof of the GoGos house.

programme.title: Holiday Resort
programme.desc: Don and colonel are about to start their wonderful holiday in an elite resort. Instead, they don’t even spend a single peaceful second in the place. Thanks to the mad rats! At last when the dogs leave the resort, they plan a nasty trap for the rats. But the rats are too smarttt…..

programme.title: Smells Like Trouble
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: SPACE INVADER
programme.desc: Krackleflint is back with the latest and greatest diabolical offering from Krackleflint Industries Inc.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Moles' Wedding
programme.desc: The Mole couple want their daughter to have the above-ground life with sunlight unlike themselves. Therefore, the couple go on a journey to find the husband who will have a joyful life with their daughter above the ground.

programme.title: SPLIT PERSONALITY
programme.desc: A fresh morning in Hotel Kelifornia sees a cheeky Basha stealing a plate full of aaloo bonda and an angry Sundar chasing him out of the shop. The chase leads them to a coconut tree and Basha starts to throw coconuts at Sundar. One of the coconuts misses the target and bounces back hitting Basha on his head. The next moment Bashas whole attitude changes and he becomes a meek and obedient slave to Sundar. Sundar is inexplicably delighted at the exciting turn of events and he put Basha to hard labour in the shop. He is serving, cleaning, pressing Sundars legs, fanning for him and so on. Now Sundar is enjoying his life. But he still has to act all hard working in front of Chai Raja. During one of such charades a steel tumbler falls on Bashas head bringing him back to his real self. An unaware Sundar bosses around soon realizing that his good times have ended. Basha sees so much cleaning and rearranging done in the shop and he himself is too tired. Putting two and two together, it is payback time. And Sundar pays everything back..with interest.

programme.title: Shrunken Jam
programme.desc: Don is baking a cake.In an apron.Puts the batter in a container the oven.Turns on the KNOB.And then... when he opens the oven door, the cake is missing. He cranes his neck and sees that there is a hole on the back of the oven! That is it, Charly Marly and Lary will pay for this!

programme.title: Less is More
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: See The Problem
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: SuperCat
programme.desc: Cat watches his favorite super hero “SuperCat” on tv and is inspired to be like him in every way even fly like him.

programme.title: The Mystery
programme.desc: Kala’s martial arts trophy has vanished – and ‘detective’ Gummy volunteers his services to unravel the mystery and track down the culprit.

programme.title: LetMeFly
programme.desc: Zoonicorn Kids Songs

programme.title: Christmas Ring Ring
programme.desc: Hey kids! Emmie our cute little elephant loves dancing & sings good english songs. Its time to enjoy the pirate song & more with Emmie! Sway and listen to great kids song like Pirate song , Rain, Catch a wave and hula hoop! Get your preschooler grooving to the beats!

programme.title: CHAI-LLENGE
programme.desc: What seems like a normal day turns quite nasty for Chai Raja as he finds an elaborately dressed Japanese) at the steps of his tea shop. He also has a sumo as his assistant. The benign looking Japanese asks for a tea challenge which Chai Raja proudly take up. After all, who can beat Chai Raja?!But the Japanese proves to have some tricks up his sleeve and Chai Rajas reputation may be in danger. The Japanese man shows some stunning tea making skills. Throw into this stressed situation, the impish Basha who finds out that all the commotion just makes it easier for him to lay hands on his favourite banana fries. Chai Raja manages to match the Japanese brew for brew- even the green tea, which Chai Raja matches with his own tulsi and elaichi brew. He even somersaults, skips and even makes tea blindfolded. And he has Sundar as his assistant. The sumo assistant is totally floored by Chai Rajas performance and he applauds, only to get whacked by his boss. But then the irked Japanese presents a tea with the colours of the rainbow. It seems as if Chai Raja is ousted when, Basha chooses the moment to annoy Sundar and the two chase. They accidentally knock over the Japanese mans trunk and out fall not ingredients but readymade teabags...the Japanese man has been cheating while Chai Raja had made his brews from scratch. The Japanese man and his assistant are sent packing minus his dignity while for once Sundar and Basha sit side by side, wolfing down banana fritters served to them as reward by a beaming Chai Raja.

programme.title: What Goes Up
programme.desc: Mayor De Pfeffle is hosting a party for all of Abra-Dabra and is granting Deedee the honour of inviting everyone to assemble at 12 o’clock sharp. But with Tiggy having prepared all the delectable dishes and only one hour to get them to the venue and Deedee rushing to invite everybody; Deedee decides to use some magic for the timebeing. On sprinkling some of her ‘light as air’ magic powder on the plates and Nino stringing them together as the master knots-man he is, Tiggy is able to walk them over to town-hall like a bunch of balloons. Deedee and Nino get to invite Charlie and the twins just when Boris misfires his new fishing dart gun onto Uncle Charlie causing him to fall out of his hammock. The Doobydoos and Mewmew are playing together by trying to find which group can make the tallest team-tower, just when Deedee and Nino invites them for the party. Back at town-hall Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy create a floating food game, but Tiggy reminds the Mayor that he isn’t good at tying knots. When the guests arrive, Mayor De Pfeffle and Tiggy usher them in and tell them how to play the game, but discover that all the strings have loosened themselves and are floating high up near the ceiling. Deedee improvises and gets the twins to use their toy dart guns to pull the food-laden plates to themselves. The Doobydoos along with Mewmew make really tall team-towers and pull their jelly plates to themselves with glee. Nino pulls down a plate that happens to be a bowl of custard. Nino gets drenched in custard, but in a very delicious way.

programme.title: BASHA vs BILLA
programme.desc: Basha is in great spirits as he once again runs circles around Sundar and gets his daily exercise leading the other in a one-sided chase when suddenly his naughtiness takes a nosedive as he finds himself face to face with his biggest rival Billa a monkey who is naughtier, meaner and more menacing. The moment Sundar finds out that Billa also has a fascination for banana fritters, he bribes the new monkey to his side. Now for the first time, Basha has to face a foe who is his match, or perhaps a tough match. Lets see how this all ends!

programme.title: CAN I KEEP HER PLEASE?
programme.desc: Buzz finds a strange seed and tenderly nurtures it. The seed sprouts and blossoms into a healthy, baby plant he names Ruby. As Ruby grows, she eats more and more healthy food and becomes very large and aggressive towards the other Creepy Candy TM. Ty-Poe suggests that Ruby be moved to a different environment out in nature. Will Buzz let her go, will she go peacefully, will the other Creepy CandyTM be eaten? Watch the funny and action packed episode to find out what happens.

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: Ski Trip Fun!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are on a vacation, skiing in Shimla. You think the trio would leave them alone?? Hell no!! Romance blossoms in the snow and the rats make sure that Don and Colonel turn against each other. And they have a great time watching them fight.

programme.title: GIVEAWAY
programme.desc: The Elders assign lots of chores to the Guardians. To get them to mellow out, Pai prepares a special dish. They become so mellow they start giving away all their possessions. Seeing an opportunity, Negu sends his henchmen to ask for the Glove of the North. Koto and Amkko fail, so Negu sends Mei and the Mutant Raccoon in disguise. The Mutant Raccoon ends up smashing himself in the face with the nunchucks given to Pai by the Elders.

programme.title: KALAI-TEA-TEA
programme.desc: Chai Raja is organizing a Kathakali performance in front of his teashop for a group of special guests in the evening. The Kathakali dancer is in the shop enjoying tea and snacks. In the crazy fight between Sundar and Basha, the dancers both legs gets bandaged and he runs away from the shop. Chai Raja catches Sundar in the act! Chai Raja is so angry and panicking. He decides that Sundar is going to dance Kathakali! Next we see a poor Sundar all dressed up in the Kathakali costume with his snout sticking out. The performance starts and Sundar doesnt know what to do. The naughty Basha still has no plans to leave poor Sundaralone. He tries to trips, tickle, push and irritate Sundar from the rafter of the stage. Sundar is running all over the stage musch to Bashas delight and Chai Rajas horror. But the special guests love Sundars performance and awards him with a trophy! Basha is stunnedand Sundar is thrilled beyond words!

programme.title: GOOD CROC, BAD CROC!
programme.desc: The Guardians enjoy a baby croc until it grows into an unmanageable mutant sent by Negu. They’ll need to train the croc, and then return it to the island Negu stole it from.

programme.title: Lunch Munch
programme.desc: GrandPA has some special guests visiting and Dunky has to make a lavish lunch.

programme.title: The Old Car
programme.desc: GrandPA wants to go out of town to visit his son, But the whole car has just collapsed and fallen apart . So tells Dunky to service his car and get it ready for him by the evening as he is resting in his room.

programme.title: COMPETITION!
programme.desc: A travelling carnival team puts up a show in front of Hotel Kelifornia. They are organizing a competition for the villagers. Climbing up the Greasy Pole. At the top is placed the trophy. Chai Raja is happy to have a crowd and good business. Sundar is happily serving tea outside when he suddenly sees the game. He is transfixed by it and wants to participate. Next we see a heated competition in which Basha, some kids, men, Sundar etc trying funnily to climb. At last it is Sundar and Basha who are left for the finals. Now they dont want each other to win. It is a maddening mayhem when Basha and Sundar play nasty tricks, traps and contraptions to make each others climb a disaster. Lets see who wins! Or will Chai Raja find out that his waiter is playing with the customers outside?! Oh my!

programme.title: PAI THE PIRATE
programme.desc: When the Guardians stumble across a treasure map, Pai happily starts playing pirate, eager to find the treasure. But the Elders warn them about the dangers of treasure, and take the map. Negu sends mutant pirates to attack the Guardians! About to walk the plank, the Guardians convince the pirates to go look for the treasure. While the pirates are distracted by the treasure, the Guardians escape to the Lord of the Wind, from which they defeat the pirates. The treasure proves to be nothing more than a bean. Pai tosses it over his shoulder, unaware that it grows into a giant stalk!

programme.title: Mission Keet
programme.desc: Cat is frustrated that he can’t catch Keet. As he is shuffling through channels he sees ad on TV of the ‘Super Ace Parrot Catchers’ A quick call gets a snobbish Black suited cat with a briefcase Knocking on the door.

programme.title: THE WATERFALL OF LIFE
programme.desc: The balance and harmony of the Yan World are knocked out of whack when Negu sends a giant mutant toad to plug up the Waterfall of Life. The Guardians have to drive off the toad and repair the stone lotus through which the water flows. Balance and harmony are restored!

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: More Ways Than One
programme.desc: When Pancake cuts Maple’s toast differently than Mama does, it sends Maple into a tailspin. Then in the Zooniverse an art competition shows her that different can be good. There can be more than one way to do things, and each can be right.

programme.title: Spooktacular.
programme.desc: The gang is ‘haunted’ by a mystery spook – and sets out to overcome their collective fear and get to the bottom of the scary mystery.

programme.title: The Star Talers
programme.desc: In the cold winter, the kindhearted girl, GoGo, meets several people who feel sorry for her on her way home. A fairy queen appears in front of a GoGGo that distributes all her clothes and bread and shakes in the cold.

programme.title: The Organizer
programme.desc: Gummy and Harry team up to become “super-organized’ – and their non-stop efficiency winds up being more than a little ‘too much of a good thing”.

programme.title: River of Time
programme.desc: An impatient Pancake must wait a WHOLE DAY to bake a cake with Mama but learns different methods of patience in the Zooniverse, where time keeps slowing down. How to manage waiting and delays with a bit of patience and optimism

programme.title: The Beginning
programme.desc: Speed has just been reunited with his father, when Zile Zazic attacks, stealing the Mach 6. Speed, Speed Sr. and the gang get the car back and defeat Zile. Speed Sr., not knowing why theyre after the car again, goes underground to investigate. Meanwhile Connor gets a strange reading off the Mach 6. Soon they discover the car has a strange anomaly - it jumps forward in space. When they start experimenting with the car they get attacked again and realize this "jump" function has something to do with why Zile was after the car.

programme.title: A sticky situation
programme.desc: Ragoo brings in a sticky wrapper and the twins arrive in a sandy desert. They travel to the pond world and to the winter world before they can put it in a bin.

programme.title: Dolphin Tales
programme.desc: Dunky has taken a small picnic bag and takes Keet to the lake. A nice day as by the lake very peaceful. Keet sees two dolphins in the lake and plays with them as they get friendly with each other. The prowling Cat is not too happy. And tries various antics to catch Keet with funny results. The dolphins become good friends with Keet and teach Cat a lesson to remember for a longtime

programme.title: Mystic Stick Gone Wild
programme.desc: When Pai complains that his stick is just like any other ordinary stick, Negu sends a horde of fake sticks, fans and swords to the Guardians. The weapons come to life and rebel against their supposed masters. April, Xia and especially Pai have to learn to connect with their own weapons to defeat the fake ones.

programme.title: Dimsum To Go
programme.desc: A bowl of lip smacking Dimsums and four pair of eyes. Don tries his best to hide it but in vain! Watch Don and the mice chase each other in this quest.

programme.title: Where’s Nino?
programme.desc: Nino is trying to have a non-magic game time with Deedee, but she wants just the opposite. So she conjures a invisi-ball game. But the spell bounces off the ball and makes Nino invisible instead. Deedee is sad her spell went cuckoo on Nino, but Nino can’t stand her magic any more, so she checks out a remedy in her magic book and finds that the spell would cancel itself with three chimes of the town hall bell. Deedee decides to get Nino to the spot at the earliest. Nino scares the Doobydoos in his new ‘form’, but soon gets them to play along as he removes his helmet and is completely invisible now. Nino loves the fact that he is invisible and plays tricks on sleepy Charlie. Deedee sees the Doobydoos playing with the helmet and think they are throwing Nino about. But when she realizes that Nino isn’t in it, she is even more worried as the spell can become permanent if it isn’t cancelled soon. Nino has lots of fun playing pranks on Tiggy, Deedee, Charlie and Mewmew. Nino soon realizes that his pranks have gone out of hand that Mayor De Pfeffle announces over the loudspeaker to get Nino to come to them. Nino appears and is stubborn to stay invisible, so Deedee catches Nino with her hat and gets him in place to take full effect of the town hall chimes. Having regained his visibility, Nino agrees that a little magic is fun.

programme.title: Robot Maid
programme.desc: GrandPA gets a big courier box at his doorstep voila ! it’s a robot maid and she is very efficient in the house within minutes she sparkles the house.

programme.title: A Rodent Fix
programme.desc: Don has a new and yummy kitchen garden. And a new thief too! For the first time, don and the rats join hands to catch the unwanted intruder. And it is indeed a veggie mess all around.

programme.title: Toothbrush
programme.desc: Be prepared to be brushed off your feet with this entertaining episode

programme.title: Chill Out
programme.desc: A hot summer afternoon. The fan has stopped working and the ice trays are empty, and who could be responsible for putting Don through all this sweat! Mottu Lambu and Chottu giggle as they watch Don spinning along with the fan, getting frozen inside a locked deep freezer. Colonel is all set to rescue Don, but will he succeed?

programme.title: BE QUIET!
programme.desc: The Guardians travel to Anjing Island to retrieve Maestro Meow’s drum from the island’s ogre, who HATES noise of any kind. But the ogre steals Pai’s voice! Will he get it back in time to sing at tonight’s Good Luck Concert?

programme.title: Runaway Custard
programme.desc: Tiggy is busy making custard and Deedee and Nino are helping out. But Mayor De Pfeffle cannot seem to understand what happened to his purple custard freshly sent over by Nino. So Mewmew offers to help while taking eggs over to Tiggy’s. But the carton turns out to only have one egg, and Tiggy needs to make eight more jars of purple custard. The answer seems to lie in Deedee’s magic spell that makes one purple custard jar never run out of purple custard for the entire day. And it works like a charm, non-stop purple custard. The Mayor gets a half eaten jar of purple custard and keeps it safe for after, only to have it finished by the Doobydoos. As the Mayor turns up at Tiggy’s once more for more purple custard, he rushes off with the jar that the spell has been cast on. A happy Mayor gets Mewmew to stay guard of the jar while he is out, and Mewmew catches the Doobydoos red handed trying to eat the custard. But the jar tips over in the confusion and unknown to Mewmew the loyal custard guard, the bottle keeps on flowing till it reaches the ground floor. Deedee is called in urgency and only Nino can fly up the building and put the jar right up again. Having done that they call all the townsfolk to come to town hall to eat up as much purple custard as they can. All join in and have a hearty treat, so much so that they cannot have a bite more. Finally Mayor De Pfeffle arrives and is happy to share his purple custard with everyone, but much to his surprise no one wants any. Wonder why?

programme.title: TUNNEL OF WHUH
programme.desc: After limited success with the direct assault approach, Durian grey employs some more underhanded tactics to destroy the Ninjas from the inside.

programme.title: Mister Perfect
programme.desc: Nora is so impressed with Eddie’s philanthropic music concert, Fred uses Friday to trick Eddie into letting him headline the show.

programme.title: Library Trouble
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are in the library. And the library has rules – of silence and composure. But with the rats trying their level best to irritate don, the library is as noisy and dirty as a market place in no time!!

programme.title: The Bigger The Lie
programme.desc: ODESSA thinks she’s gotten away with a little white lie until she visits the Zooniverse where she meets the FIBASAURUS – a tiny, fantastical creature that grows bigger and bigger with every fib that Odessa tells until it is a towering monster capable of upending the Zooniverse!. Little white lies can only grow larger and larger.

programme.title: BABY DRAGON
programme.desc: Xia tries to master his transformation into the Dragon Warrior. Negu sends a Mutant Dragon, who decides Xia would be a perfect baby for her. April and Pai get the Mutant Dragon to fall in love with their dragon-shaped ship, the Lord of the Wind.

programme.title: Stitch in Time
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Music Mayhem
programme.desc: Whoever heard of Ipods short circuiting? To add to that rigged head phones, musical bombs and bombastic explosions that takes them to outer space. The brother duo gets mummified ultimately but still there is no end to this musical mayhem.

programme.title: Ant Attack!
programme.desc: It is a usual day in the house with the war between the dogs and the rats. And there is a new group. In fact an army of enemies – ants! And they make the life in the house a living hell. For the first time Don , Colonel and the rat trio get a real taste of the bad ants.

programme.title: Magic Shoes
programme.desc: One day a frustrated Don get a wonderful gift – a pair of magic shoes. He is all too excited to try the new weapons. But the rats make him realize that the gift is in fact a curse. Don is not ready to give up, and at last he turns out to be street smart and succeeds in throwing his arch rivals out of his house – for the first time. But how???

programme.title: Mangorush
programme.desc: Hurray!! It is mango season and Don is ready to fill his belly. But lary marly and charly are all set for the loot. With mangoes and grenades all around, they all get what they deserv

programme.title: Bored
programme.desc: Kala is bored, and Gummy and Harry’s attempts to snap her out of it wind up having unexpected results.

programme.title: The Thing That Slept Over
programme.desc: An alien slug monster that inhabits it’s victims has possessed some girl at school, but Brains doesn’t know which one. She awkwardly throws her first slumber party to figure it out. Simone, the new girl Fred has a crush on, carries the alien, and attracts Fred and Sir Percival to sap their human energy!

programme.title: A Cola Fix !!
programme.desc: Don and Colonel are into a new business – COLONEL COLA!!! But there are three unwanted partners – of course the rats! With them running loose in the factory, the dogs have a hard time keeping themselves alive, let alone the business stand. Business turns into a busy mess.

programme.title: Basket Bunny
programme.desc: Fred bargains with the girls basketball team to let Brains join the team. In return, he agrees to be team’s bunny mascot, commanding Friday into a pair of super-jumping shoes. His get up proves handy when Brains needs his help capturing a massive space chicken.

programme.title: I Lee
programme.desc: Sindbad is an extra-terrestrial, living his life on earth as a 14 year old boy. He and his friends Zac, Lana and Lee live regular lives, doing all the things that kids do: going to school, hanging out with friends, playing sports and computer games, doing homework and pushing back against their parents. After school, the extraordinary adventures begin. With a spaceship stored in the basement they are able to travel to planets in the 7 Galaxies. Sindbad discovers his special powers step by step. As leader of the team, he takes his friends on missions, trying to save the 7 Galaxies from disaster.

programme.title: Sideways Day
programme.desc: Odessa learns to accept Pancake’s idea over her own when she joins the Zoonicorns in Sideways Day.Accepting other’s ideas even if they’re different from your own.

programme.title: Rose Trick
programme.desc: Dunky is taking special care of a beautiful red rose in his garden which he plans to give it to his girlfriend in the evening. And has just stopped Cat from almost ruining it.

programme.title: Duda Buddy
programme.desc: Duda thinks the Scottie Buddy is pretty awesome and asks Scot if he could go for a ride. Scot flatly refuses, so Duda is determined to make a Scottie Buddy of his own. Realizing that it is difficult to make one, Duda returns to Scot hoping for some help. Scot agrees to help Duda if he becomes his assistant. But Duda ends up causing more chaos instead of being helpful. Scot sends him off with a box of old parts and tells him to make his own Duda Buddy. Surprisingly, Duda manages to build a decent replica. Meanwhile, Scot discovers that his new wheel is not suitable for Scottie Buddy and wants him to return his old wheel to Duda...

programme.title: Super Thomas

programme.title: You're All Useless!
programme.desc: Negu is sick and tired of Amkko, Koto and Mei’s uselessness and kicks them out. The Guardians try to teach them to behave properly so they can fit in in the Yan World, but the Mutants are the worst students ever. Negu sends them a message saying that if they snatch the Glove of the North, he’ll take them back, so Mei tricks the Guardians into taking them to the Magic Fort and tries to steal the glove. Everyone is relieved that the Mutants are back to normal.

programme.desc: Hosted by Utt, Incredible Tales returns for Season 7, featuring more ghoulish stories of paranormal encounters from Singapore, Malaysia, Thailand and Philippines. Incredible Tales is all about ghost stories told through generations, crossing boundaries of culture and language. Stories that generate intrigue, fascination, and fear.

programme.title: Vettai
programme.desc: "They are part of a special task force assembled to tackle cases pertaining to the Indian community and Indian immigrants. The unit is not widely publicized and their work is kept under wraps. Spearheaded by Chief Dayanidhi, the team consists of three teams and an assigned criminologist. Together they try to tackle cold blooded murders, kidnaps and sexual crimes. But as their professional and personal lives collide, the team is headed towards a perilous outcome. Lives will be lost and bonds will be broken. The pledge that they made to uphold justice and peace in the country that they love will be put to the test. How will they survive? Where does it all lead to? Who is the villain and who is the hero?"

programme.title: Aladdin and His Wonderful Lamp 1939
programme.desc: Working in the story department of Surprise Pictures, Olive Oyl writes a script based on the story of Aladdin, casting Popeye as the thief and herself as the Princess

programme.title: Fresh Airedale 1945
programme.desc: In his master's eyes, "good old Shep" is the perfect dog, but the cat knows he's really a two-faced mutt who can be bought off with a bone by a burglar, and then take credit for it when the cat chases the crook off. But then Shep becomes obsessed by a newspaper story proclaiming a real canine hero the nation's "No. 1 Dog."

programme.title: Molly Moo-Cow and the Indians-1935
programme.desc: A Native American hunter tries to hunt two ducks. A cow saves them, so the hunter goes after the cow

programme.title: Space Transformer 1985
programme.desc: Using new technology, a crew consisting of Captain Chi, Nancy, and the robots Baipam and Diatron 5, is shrunken to microscopic size and injected into Ivy's body in order to defeat the invaders. Enlisting benevolent beings found inside Ivy's body, the crew prepares for an inner space battle that can decide the fate of the world.

programme.title: A Date to Skate 1938
programme.desc: Popeye takes Olive roller skating in a rink; she's never skated before, so he has to teach her, and she's not exactly a quick learner. After a while, she ends up outside the rink, and still out of control; she skates through a department store and causes major traffic problems. When she gets stuck on a speeding fire truck, Popeye realizes he'll need his spinach, but he's out fortunately, an audience member tosses him a can.

programme.title: Jumpin' Jupiter 1955
programme.desc: Porky and Sylvester's desert campground is sliced away and towed into outer space by a green, bird-like Jupiterian searching for earthly animal life. But Porky remains blissfully unaware, leaving Sylvester to be terrorized by the alien.

programme.title: Fox Pop 1942
programme.desc: Hearing that silver foxes are all the rage in high society, a fox paints himself silver and gets himself trapped, finding out too late that it's only his fur anyone is interested in

programme.title: Taxi Turvy 1945
programme.desc: On the outside of an office building, Popeye and Bluto duke it out as rival window washers.

programme.title: Popeye's 20th Anniversary 1954
programme.desc: Popeye is being honored for his 20 years of films, in a dinner hosted by 'Bob Hope' (several other celebrities are present, like 'Jimmy Durante', Bing Crosby, 'Jerry Lewis' and 'Dean Martin'). When called on to make a speech, he instead shows clips from two of his movies. Bluto does a slow burn through this, finally stuffing Popeye's trophy onto Popeye's head - but the trophy is full of spinach, so Popeye clobbers Bluto.

programme.title: Bride and Gloom
programme.desc: Popeye is marrying Olive tomorrow; he's ecstatic. She has a dream of the future, including twin sons who prove to be a real handful. When Popeye comes by the next morning, he gets a frosty reception

programme.title: Superman: Billion Dollar Limited-1950
programme.desc: Superman battles train robbers seeking to steal a billion dollars worth of gold.

programme.title: The Booze Hangs High-1930
programme.desc: Bosko has a grand time on the farm, dancing with a cow, playing a horse's tail like a violin and getting drunk with three pigs

programme.title: I Never Changes My Altitude 1937
programme.desc: Popeye is sitting outside Olive's lunchroom at the airport, distraught. She's closed the business to fly away with an aviator (Bluto, of course). But it's hardly what she expected; he has her painting his plane, while it's flying; when she says she's rather go back to Popeye, he tries to throw her off the plane. Popeye sees this, and takes off in a plane, just in time to help her out. The boys get into a dogfight, and Bluto manages to demolish Popeye's plane. As Popeye is falling, he grabs a duck and feeds the duck spinach. The duck manages to fly him up to Bluto's plane, Popeye has some spinach of his own, and he teaches Bluto a lesson. Popeye picks up Olive and crashes the plane into the diner, opening it (and providing a new counter).

programme.title: Gopher Spinach 1954
programme.desc: Popeye battles a gopher over his precious spinach plants.

programme.title: Popeye the Sailor Meets Ali Baba's Forty Thieves 1937
programme.desc: Popeye the Sailor, accompanied by Olive Oyl and Wimpy, is dispatched to stop the dreaded bandit Abu Hassan and his force of forty thieves.

programme.title: April Maze-1930
programme.desc: Felix the Cat and his two nephews try to have a picnic, but a thunderstorm and a thieving rabbit prevent them.

programme.title: Spree Lunch 1957
programme.desc: Popeye opens a diner; Bluto pulls one up right across the street. Wimpy comes along, and they compete for his business. The competition escalates, until finally they are throwing things at each other; Wimpy stands between them and snags a complete meal from the stream of objects passing overhead. Another spinach-free Popeye.

programme.title: Little Boy Blue 1936
programme.desc: The Big Bad Wolf stalks Little Bo Peep and steals one of her sheep. She enlists Little Boy Blue and a dancing scarecrow to assist her and her mischievous black sheep in rescuing it. Singing, dancing, hilarity and impalement ensue.

programme.title: There's Good Boos Tonight 1948
programme.desc: Casper makes friends with a fox cub. But the new friendship is threatened when a fox hunter and his two hounds come on the scene.

programme.title: Charlie Chaplin's: The Good for Nothing 1914
programme.desc: Charlie meets a couple and agrees to care for the man's crippled uncle. After the couple breaks up, the man's new girl drops some eggs, which Charlie slips on while trying to control the wheelchair. Charlie sets up the uncle near another wheelchair on a jetty, from which he lifts a beggar's cup and "invalid" sign; he places these with the uncle and money starts to roll in. Charlie takes the money and buys himself a drink. Returning, he gets to know the abandoned young woman. After pushing the uncle and his chair into the drink and battling the beggar and two policemen, one of whom arrests the uncle, Charlie beats up his rival and gets the girl

programme.title: His Favorite Pastime - 1914
programme.desc: A very plastered fella follows a pretty woman home, and proceeds to make a nuisance of himself

programme.title: The Andy Griffith Show 1963; Season 3; Episode 18;The Loaded Goat
programme.desc: What do you do with a goat full of dynamite? Nobody in Mayberry seems to know, least of all Otis, who shows up even more 'loaded' than the goat

programme.title: The Bashful Bachelor-1942
programme.desc: Lum Edwards is annoyed with his partner in Pine Ridge's Jot-'em-Down general store, Abner Peabody, because Abner has swapped their delivery car for a racehorse. Lum is also too timid to propose to Geraldine, so he involves Abner in a "rescue" effort which nearly gets both of them killed. They try again, and this time Geraldine is impressed. Lum writes a proposal note, but Abner, by mistake, delivers it to the Widder Abernathy, who has been ready to remarry for years. This puts Lum in a peck of trouble until the sheriff appears with the Widder's long-gone and hiding husband

programme.title: The Goat 1921
programme.desc: A series of adventures begins when an accident during photographing causes Buster to be mistaken for Dead Shot Dan, the local bad guy.

programme.title: The General 1926
programme.desc: After being rejected by the Confederate military, not realizing it was due to his crucial civilian role, an engineer must single-handedly recapture his beloved locomotive after it is seized by Union spies and return it through enemy lines

programme.title: The latest sports that you may have missed!
You are watching the latest sports news from around the world!
Game previews, highlights and interviews from your favorite sport!
See what happened in the world of sports while you were sleeping!
The Deadly Companions -1961
programme.desc: An ex-army officer accidentally kills a woman's son and tries to make up for it by escorting the funeral procession through dangerous Indian territory.

programme.title: The Roy Rogers Show:S1E4: The Lady Killer
programme.desc: Ranchers are turning up dead in Lost Valley. It turns out that the local banker, a woman, is behind the killings, in order to get the ranchers' land. In the course of his investigation, Roy learns that eight-year-old Jamie Jenkins is next on the banker's list.

programme.title: Clash of The Copper Kings
programme.desc: KG and Ringy are back in their old stomping grounds in the mountains of Montana, on the hunt for items left behind by 19th century copper miners and their embattled bosses, bathed in cheating, deceit, payoffs, and more.

programme.title: Angel and the Badman - 1947
programme.desc: Quirt Evans, an all round bad guy, is nursed back to health and sought after by Penelope Worth, a Quaker girl. He eventually finds himself having to choose between his world and the world Penelope lives in

programme.title: The Tonto Kid 1934
programme.desc: Lawyer Creech is after the ranch of the dying Cartwright. First he brings in Cahill to pose as the only living relative. Then when the Tonto Kid finds platinum on the ranch, Creech frames him for murder.

programme.title: Forbidden Dream
programme.desc: Sejong, the 4th king of Joseon Dynasty, has been interested in advancing science and technology. He appoints Jang Young-sil, a slave and scientific genius, to be a low-level officer despite a bitter opposition of the court. Jang blossoms his talents by making the most accurate water clock that has ever made. Sejong wants to create a new calendar that can replace the Chinese one from the g Dynasty.

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: ARI GLOBAL - LA PERIODISTA QUE TE CAMBIARÁ LA MIRADA SOBRE LOS FAMOSOS
programme.desc:
En este episodio entrevistamos a Ari Global, nacida entre el prestigioso medio de comunicación venezolano "Cisneros Media" ahora dedica su vida al periodismo, la periodista nos cuenta cómo es entrevistar a las celebridades más famosas y cuál cree que sea el secreto de su éxito. Además hablamos de su libro en donde narra en primera persona muchas de estas entrevistas.
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: PIZZA & MATE: MARAVILLA MARTÍNEZ - CUÁNDO SERÁ SU ÚLTIMA VEZ EN EL RING?
programme.desc:
En nuestro primer episodio hablamos con Maravilla Martínez acerca de su carrera, sus comienzos, su presente, los desafíos atravesados en el camino, las terapias alternativas como las regresiones a vidas pasadas y mucho más!
Este programa fusiona dos mundos irresistibles: el periodismo de actualidad y la auténtica gastronomía italiana. Junto a Sol Macaluso, periodista internacional con una comunidad activa y fiel, y su pareja, Gennaro Arrichiello, pizzaiolo napolitano, ofrecerán un contenido diferente, donde cada episodio traerá conversaciones divertidas con invitados famosos e influyentes. Episodios nuevos cada JUEVES por todas las plataformas. @pizzaymate.podcast

programme.title: Concierto Poético de Laura Chimaras: 6 Poemas de Amor y Vida | Música en Vivo | Memorias
STEPHANIE CARRILLO: "La maternidad transformó mi vida" | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 3
programme.desc:
En este episodio tenemos a Stefi Carrillo, quien nos comparte un testimonio conmovedor de resiliencia y lucha. Su maternidad, resultado de un tratamiento de fertilización in vitro, marcó un nuevo capítulo lleno de desafíos y alegrías. Con dos mellizas y una carrera exitosa, Stefi demuestra que con fe, apoyo y determinación, es posible equilibrar sueños profesionales y la vida personal.
Este es un llamado a todas las mujeres para que, con valentía, sigan adelante enfrentando los desafíos, se cuiden y celebren sus logros, porque, como dice Stefi, reconocer nuestro propio valor es parte esencial de ese camino. Roche nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio.

programme.title: MELINA VICARIO: “No existe cura sin el miedo al diagnóstico” | La generación del Cambio - Episodio 4
programme.desc:
En el último episodio de Agente del Cambio, Meli Vicario nos regala una poderosa lección de vida, compartiendo su historia de lucha, esperanza y superación. Nos recuerda la importancia de escuchar nuestro cuerpo, de nunca rendirnos y de ser tenaces cuando buscamos respuestas para nuestra salud y nuestra vida.
A través de su experiencia, Meli hace un llamado a todas las personas, y nos recuerda que, aunque los diagnósticos pueden ser difíciles y los caminos inciertos, nunca debemos dejar de buscar respuestas ni permitir que nuestra voz se apague.
Roche, nos motiva a formar parte de la Generación del Cambio, un movimiento que invita a levantar la voz, compartir nuestras historias, y luchar por una atención médica más equitativa y accesible para todos.
